system.description: The Ogryn's brutal finishing moves inspire terror in all who witness them.
system.benefit: Once per Encounter, when this character inflicts Critical Damage on an enemy by dealing damage in excess of the enemy's Wounds, they can Spend a Fate Point to instantly kill them in a gruesome manner. The Character gains Fear(2) against all foes who witness this until the end of the encounter.

specialAbilities.name: Gruesome Execution
specialAbilities.description: Once per encounter, when inflicting Critical Damage that exceeds enemy Wounds, spend a Fate Point to instantly kill them. Gain Fear (2) against witnesses until end of encounter.
